Name: Rat Prison
About the game: Rat Prison - pixel 2D simulator with horror elements. Have you ever been afraid of rats? But what if you are left alone with many of these critters in a locked dungeon? There is only darkness, silence, and many small paws moving from wall to wall. And it seems that footsteps of a larger creature are heard nearby ... Your task: to inspect the prison, check the condition of the prisoners, and stay alive, not allowing the darkness to come to you, otherwise you will lose your mind.
Meta Title: Rat Prison: Jul 22, 2021, Crooked Road and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Rat Prison? Check out the release date (Jul 22, 2021), developer insights from Crooked Road, and a complete game summary.
